meta.title: World Education & Innovation College of Kyrgyzstan
meta.description: Leading higher education institution in Kyrgyzstan focused on innovation, excellence, and global education standards.
meta.keywords: education, college, Kyrgyzstan, innovation, higher education, university

hero.title: World Education & Innovation College of Kyrgyzstan
hero.subtitle: Empowering minds, shaping futures through innovative education and global excellence

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.mission_text: To provide world-class education that combines academic excellence with practical innovation, preparing students to become global leaders and change-makers.
mission.vision_text: To be the leading educational institution in Central Asia, recognized for our commitment to innovation, research, and developing future leaders.

about.title: About Us
about.history_text: Founded with a vision to transform higher education in Kyrgyzstan, our college has been at the forefront of educational innovation since its establishment. We combine traditional academic excellence with modern teaching methodologies.
about.faculty_subtitle: Meet our distinguished educators and researchers
achievements: Accredited by International Education Standards Board

admissions.title: Admissions
admissions.fees_text: We offer competitive tuition rates with various financial aid options available for qualified students.
admissions.international_text: We welcome students from around the world and provide comprehensive support for international applicants.

footer.description: Leading higher education institution in Kyrgyzstan, committed to excellence in education and innovation.
